profile.name: ZHOU Qi
profile.title: Ph.D. Student at The Hong Kong Polytechnic University

about: I am currently studying on the fusion of Large Language Models (LLMs).

I am a Ph.D. Student at The Hong Kong Polytechnic University, advised by Prof. Hongxia Yang. My research is centered on enhancing the capabilities of AI systems, with a primary focus on Model over Models and Posttrain of LLMs.
My previous research is mainly on AI security and interpretability, specifically, the backdoor defense in Deep Neural Networks based on image classification tasks.

publications.title: InfiGFusion: Graph-on-Logits Distillation via Efficient Gromov-Wasserstein for Model Fusion
